description: This Dart file defines a responsive Flutter widget named AdaptiveScaffold which provides an adaptable navigation layout depending on screen size. It includes classes for defining destinations, and implements different UI patterns for small, medium, and large screens using Scaffold, NavigationBar, NavigationRail, and Drawer components.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffoldDestination
classes.description: Represents a navigation item with icon and label, optionally with a selected icon.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffold
classes.description: A Flutter widget that provides a responsive scaffold adapting its navigation layout based on screen size.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the responsive scaffold layout by selecting the appropriate navigation patterns for small, medium, and large screens.
